summary:
## Sapphire: A Sparkling Gemstone

Sapphires are precious gemstones, usually blue, made of a mineral called corundum. They can also be other colors like yellow, purple, and green.  Sapphires are super strong (9 out of 10 on the hardness scale) and are used in jewelry and some special technology.  They are found in countries like Sri Lanka, Myanmar, and Australia. Sapphires are the birthstone for September and celebrate 45th anniversaries.
title: Sapphire
